name: Avalon Holdings Corporation
description: Avalon Holdings Corporation is a diversified company involved primarily in the environmental services and resort and leisure industries. Founded in 1998 and headquartered in Warren, Ohio, Avalon provides a range of services that include waste management, recycling, and remediation. The company is committed to sustainability and environmental stewardship, offering innovative solutions that help mitigate the effects of waste on the environment. In addition to its environmental services, Avalon operates a number of recreational facilities, including golf courses and resorts, enhancing community engagement through outdoor activities and leisure opportunities. The company aims to create a balance between economic growth and ecological preservation, making significant contributions to local economies while promoting responsible environmental practices. With a focus on quality service and community involvement, Avalon Holdings continues to expand its operations and enhance its portfolio, striving for a sustainable future.
